insert into his_infusion (id, record_id, hosptalregist_number, start_time, patient_id, usages, intervals, speed, duration, drugs_numb, drugname, single_dose, single_unit, is_skin_test, dosage, unit, price, create_user_id, create_date, update_user_id, update_date, remarks, number, type, project_id, nurse_id, medication_id ,start_time_varchar ) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.hosptalregistNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.usages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.intervals,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.speed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.drugsNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.drugname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.singleDose,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.singleUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isSkinTest,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.nurseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.medicationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.startTimeVarchar,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select a.* ,c.name as nurseName ,d.small_unit as smallUnit from his_infusion as a LEFT JOIN his_user_nurse as b on b.user_id = a.nurse_id LEFT JOIN his_nurse as c on b.nurse_id = c.id LEFT JOIN his_medication_details as d on a.drugs_numb = d.id where a.number = #{parameter.number,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
order by ${parameter.orders}

select a.* ,c.name as nurseName ,d.count as countNumber ,d.small_unit as smallUnit ,e.name as patientName from his_infusion as a LEFT JOIN his_user_nurse as b on b.user_id = a.nurse_id LEFT JOIN his_nurse as c on b.nurse_id = c.id LEFT JOIN his_medication_details as d on a.drugs_numb = d.id LEFT JOIN his_patient_info as e on a.patient_id = e.id where a.number = #{number,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select a.* ,c.name as nurseName ,d.count as countNumber ,d.small_unit as smallUnit ,e.name as patientName from his_infusion as a LEFT JOIN his_user_nurse as b on b.user_id = a.nurse_id LEFT JOIN his_nurse as c on b.nurse_id = c.id LEFT JOIN his_medication_details as d on a.drugs_numb = d.id LEFT JOIN his_patient_info as e on a.patient_id = e.id where a.remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select a.* ,c.name as nurseName ,d.drugs_spec as drugsSpec ,d.small_unit as smallUnit ,e.name as patientName from his_infusion as a LEFT JOIN his_user_nurse as b on b.user_id = a.nurse_id LEFT JOIN his_nurse as c on b.nurse_id = c.id LEFT JOIN his_pharmacy_detail as d on a.drugs_numb = d.drugs_numb LEFT JOIN his_patient_info as e on a.patient_id = e.id where a.number = #{number,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select a.* ,c.name as nurseName ,d.count as countNumber ,d.small_unit as smallUnit ,h.sale_price ,e.name as patient_name ,f.medical_record_id as medical_record_number from his_infusion as a LEFT JOIN his_user_nurse as b on b.user_id = a.nurse_id LEFT JOIN his_nurse as c on b.nurse_id = c.id LEFT JOIN his_medication_details as d on a.drugs_numb = d.id left join his_pharmacy_detail as h on h.drugs_numb = d.drugs_numb LEFT JOIN his_patient_info as e on a.patient_id = e.id left join his_medical_record as f on f.id = a.record_id where a.record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT Distinct a.record_id,a.start_time,a.duration,a.number, b.medical_record_id FROM his_infusion AS a LEFT JOIN his_medical_record AS b ON b.id = a.record_id WHERE a.record_id = #{parameter.recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.*, c.sale_price FROM his_infusion AS a left join his_medication_details as b on b.id = a.drugs_numb left join his_pharmacy_detail as c on c.drugs_numb = b.drugs_numb WHERE a.number = #{parameter.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.*, c.drugs_spec as drugsSpec, c.id as medicineId from his_infusion as a left join his_medication_details as b on a.medication_id = b.id left join his_medicine_info as c on a.drugs_numb = c.drugs_numb where 1=1 and b.is_pay = 2 and a.hosptalregist_number = #{medicalRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.id

select a.* from his_infusion as a left join his_medication_details as b on a.medication_id = b.id where b.drugs_numb =#{drugsNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.hosptalregist_number = #{hosptalregistNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
